name: Export Powerhouse
title: Dominating Exports to East Asia & Pacific
description: In 2023, Mongolia exported 91.71% of its merchandise to low- and middle-income economies in East Asia & Pacific, showcasing its strong trade ties with the region.

name: Land of the Nomads
title: Minimal Permanent Cropland
description: As of 2022, only 0.34% of Mongolia's land area is dedicated to permanent cropland, reflecting its vast open landscapes and nomadic traditions.

name: Financial Struggles
title: Negative Financial Asset Acquisition
description: In 2021, Mongolia experienced a net acquisition of financial assets at -6.44% of GDP, indicating financial challenges and potential economic instability.

name: Health Detection Gap
title: Low Tuberculosis Case Detection
description: Mongolia's tuberculosis case detection rate was only 18% in 2023, highlighting significant gaps in healthcare and disease management.
